title: 110_s1761
content: Safety and Accountability in Construction Act - Requires state transportation departments to submit project management plans for federal-aid highway projects to the Secretary of Transportation for approval. Authorizes the Secretary to contract with a qualified independent engineer to provide independent safety reviews of federally-financed highway projects if certain determinations are made. Requires the Secretary to establish a national tunnel inspection program . Authorizes states to obligate apportioned surface transportation program funds for: (1) the construction and repair of tunnels, and (2) tunnel safety inspections.
